amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to Increase and decrease the Medical and Prosthetic Research account at the Department of Veterans Affairs to express support for recently announced Department of Veterans Affairs funded research into psychedelic-assisted therapies to treat PTSD and depression, and to encourage the Department of Veterans Affairs to prioritize the proactive training of therapists to administer these treatments.
